meanings.definition: A Greek dish made with cheese and filo pastry.
meanings.sent1: I enjoyed a delicious tyropita for lunch.
meanings.sent2: The bakery sells freshly baked tyropita every morning.
meanings.sent3: At the party, everyone fought over the last piece of tyropita.
meanings.sent4: The aroma of the warm tyropita filled the room.
meanings.sent5: The golden crust of the tyropita was perfectly crispy.

meanings.definition: A type of savory pastry filled with cheese.
meanings.sent1: My mom's homemade tyropita is always a hit at family gatherings.
meanings.sent2: I bought a tyropita from the bakery for a quick snack.
meanings.sent3: The tyropita looked so tempting that I couldn't resist taking a bite.
meanings.sent4: The flaky layers of the tyropita melted in my mouth.
meanings.sent5: The cheesy filling of the tyropita oozed out with each bite.
